answer

Class Answer

  • java.lang.Object
    • answer.Answer

  • public class Answer
extends java.lang.Object
    Answer To list the answers id, answer, poll and total from and to the database for display in jsp files.
    Version:
    1.0 5‐01‐2018
    Author:
    Tilly Koot
